text:
Selena Gomez and Justin Bieber have been facing a lot of stressful situations lately, like disapproval from the 'rents over their renewed relationship and struggles with anxiety and depression. But the pair are keeping romance alive despite everything.

Fans were delighted to spot Jelena out on a date in L.A. at the Rex Orange County show in Los Angeles last night. Not only were they looking totally adorbs attending the concert together — fans also spotted them getting cuddly in the middle of the street. Really.

Look at how cute Justin is dude 😢😢😢😢 i legit sneaked this pic so hard but fuck i had to get his cuteness before I left pic.twitter.com/X9u78zR0MM — ༺LESLY༻ (@lovergirlles) February 9, 2018

Fans claim they were totally mid makeout sesh.

Not sure what Bieber and Selena making out in front of the @rexorangecounty show means but I’m down. — Paul Tao (@paultao) February 9, 2018

Oh, to be young and in love!

Noelle Devoe is the Entertainment Editor at Seventeen.com. Follow her on Twitter and Instagram!
